description:
MB-Ruler offers several measurement instruments for measuring distances and angles on the screen.

All measurement instruments are displayed in an unobtrusive, almost-transparent layer above all other items on the screen.  Therefore, you can integrate its use neatly with other applications while continuing to work with the applications below the MB-Ruler.

#### Features
* triangular ruler
* coordinate system
* screen cutter (for the easy creation of screen shots)
* RGB picker
* screen loupe
* overlay objects
* remote interface

The general use of MB-Ruler is very easy. All functions can be accessed through the context menu (right mouse button) of the MB-Ruler Icon in the taskbar.  Help on using MB-Ruler can be found [here](http://www.markus-bader.de/MB-Ruler/help/quickstart.freeware.htm) and [here](http://www.markus-bader.de/MB-Ruler/tutorial.php).

### Windows 10 requirement
Version 5.4 of MB-Ruler requires Windows 10 (or newer).

### License
MB-Ruler is freeware for private and **non-commercial** use.  
If you use MB-Ruler in a commercial environment, you must order a license after a test period of 14 days.
[Read more about ordering commercial MB-Ruler licenses here.](http://www.markus-bader.de/MB-Ruler/commercialuse.php)
summary: A triangular screen ruler for on-screen measurements.
author: Markus Bader
